mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY') AS YEAR FROM T_TICKET_INFO
SELECT TUI.USER_NAME, TCI.COMPANY_NAME FROM T_USER_INFO TUI LEFT JOIN T_COMPANY_INFO TCI ON TUI.COMPANY_ID = TCI.COMPANY_ID WHERE TUI.USER_CLASS = 'USER' AND TCI.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}
SELECT COMPANY_NAME, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = MANAGER_ID) AS USER_NAME FROM T_COMPANY_INFO WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}

SELECT TTI.STATUS_CD, TTI.TITLE, TTI.REQUEST_TYPE_CD, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = MANAGER_ID) AS MANAGER_NM, TO_CHAR(TTI.CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-dd') AS CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(TTI.EXPECTED_COMPLETE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-dd') AS EXPECTED_COMPLETE_DT, TO_CHAR(TTI.COMPLETE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-dd') AS COMPLETE_DT, TTI.SUPPORT_CD, TTI.MD FROM T_TICKET_INFO TTI WHERE TO_CHAR(TTI.CREATE_DT, 'YYYYMM') = #{opReportId} AND TTI.DELETE_YN = 'N'
